amendment.description: An amendment numbered 97 printed in Part B of House Report 115-295 to designate $12 million for programs benefiting the Ethiopian-Israeli community.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Hastings amendment (A054) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Hastings amendment (A054) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A054) offered by Mr. Hastings.
